mlr3survival 0.1.0.9000
  • Reference

Survival Task

Source: R/TaskSurv.R
TaskSurv.Rd

This task specializes mlr3::Task and mlr3::TaskSupervised for right-censored survival problems.

Format

R6Class object inheriting from mlr3::Task/mlr3::TaskSupervised.

Usage

Inherits from [mlr3::Task]/[mlr3::TaskSupervised].

# Construction
t = TaskSupervised$new(id, backend, time, status)
    [mlr3::Task]: R:mlr3::Task
[mlr3::TaskSupervised]: R:mlr3::TaskSupervised

Arguments

  • time (numeric()): Time of event.

  • status (numeric()): Event indicator. 0 means "alive" (no event), 1 means dead (event).

Examples

library(mlr3)
data("lung", package = "survival")
b = as_data_backend(lung)
task = TaskSurv$new("lung", backend = b, time = "time", status = "status")

task$target_names
#> [1] "time"   "status"
task$feature_names
#> [1] "age"       "inst"      "meal.cal"  "pat.karno" "ph.ecog"   "ph.karno" 
#> [7] "sex"       "wt.loss"  
task$formula
#> Surv(time, status) ~ age + inst + meal.cal + pat.karno + ph.ecog + 
#>     ph.karno + sex + wt.loss
#> <environment: namespace:survival>
task$truth()
#>   [1]  306   166   166   559+  450   364   107   177   156   529+   11   429
